saulecabrera commented on issue #6860:

Thanks for the review @cfallin -- I'll address each of your review comments separately once I'm done investigating a segmentation fault happening on linux.

saulecabrera commented on issue #6860:

I've addressed all of your review comments @cfallin and also fixed a couple of bugs that I found. I think this is ready for another pass.
